message_1: Suppose you have collected the daily temperature data of a city for the past 31 days (from 1st January to 31st January) and want to analyze the trend of the temperature. The temperature data is given in degrees Celsius (Â°C). Create a time series plot and calculate the 7-day moving average of the temperature. What was the highest and lowest temperature recorded during this time period?
message_2: To create a time series plot and calculate the 7-day moving average, we need the actual temperature data for the 31 days. Please provide the temperature data for each day from 1st January to 31st January.
